DOC.criteria: Main â‰¥ 18 year age , Receiving stable maintenance hemodialysis 3 time week On restricted phosphate diet screen throughout study Receiving stable dose phosphate binder least 1 month Serum phosphate level > 1.78 mmol/L Main Uncontrolled hyperphosphatemia Hypercalcemia screen washout Serum calcium < 1.9 mmol/L ( < 7.6 mg/dL ) Severe hyperparathyroidism ( iPTH level > 600 ng/L ) Pregnancy lactation Iron deficiency anemia History hemochromatosis ferritin > 800 mg/L , Hepatitis B , hepatitis C significant concurrent liver disorder Known positivity HIV Use oral iron preparation 1 month screening , Serious medical condition uncontrolled systemic disease
